sentences.english: It is a neighborhood beset by all the usual inner-city problems.
sentences.chinese: 这是个为各种内城常见问题所困扰的社区。

sentences.english: Chaoyang city's urban form is divided into outer city and inner city.
sentences.chinese: 朝阳古城的城市形态主要分为外城和内城。

sentences.english: He was educated in the inner city completing high school and 2 years of college.
sentences.chinese: 他是受过教育的内城完成高中和2年的大学。

sentences.english: Liang said there were two difficulties in locating a governmental centre in the old city.
sentences.chinese: 梁思成指出，将政府行政中心建在内城面临两大困难。

sentences.english: Inside Beijing the city strolls today, still can see constantly deep curtilage courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 今天在北京内城漫步，还能时时看见深宅大院。

sentences.english: The inner city is aproned by low-cost housing.
sentences.chinese: 内城被成本低的房屋围绕着。

sentences.english: The government will continue to try to regenerate inner city areas.
sentences.chinese: 政府将继续努力重建内城地区。

sentences.english: It was all that was left of the town of Seney.
sentences.chinese: 这便是塞内城仅存的东西。

sentences.english: The Erskineville House consists of the remodeling of a very small inner-city terrace house.
sentences.chinese: 这个项目是对一个很小的内城露台住宅的改造。

sentences.english: The Imperial court is now concerned with the officials and royalty.
sentences.chinese: 这京城内城只是一些各部官员和皇亲国戚。

definition: Imperial City, inner part of Beijing, with the Forbidden City at its center
Miyagi prefecture in the north of Japan's main island Honshū 本州[Ben3 zhou1]
enceinte of a city gate/barbican entrance to a city
